name: Edujugon\Laradoo\Odoo
short_desc:
Odoo Class
Used to connect with the odoo.com ERP.

ripcord.name: ripcord
ripcord.short_desc: RipCord Class - XML-RPC library for PHP - https://github.com/poef/ripcord

uid.name: uid
uid.short_desc: User identifier used in authenticated calls instead of the login.

can.name: can
can.short_desc: Check access rights on a model.

limit.name: limit
limit.long_desc: Also can pass offset to start from that value.

search.name: search
search.short_desc: By default, retrieve the ids based on a previous passed condition.
search.long_desc: If no condition, all are retrieved.

count.name: count
count.short_desc: Count the items in a model based on the condition.

version.name: version
version.long_desc:
If key passed it returns the key value of the collection
No need authentication

fieldsOf.name: fieldsOf
fieldsOf.long_desc:
the most interesting items for a human user are string (the field's label),
help (a help text if available) and type (to know which values to expect,
or to send when updating a record)

create.name: create
create.short_desc: Create a single record and return its database identifier.

update.name: update
update.short_desc: Update one or more records based on a previous passed condition.

deleteById.name: deleteById
deleteById.short_desc: Remove a record by Id or Ids.

call.name: call
call.short_desc: Run Client execute_kw call with provided params.

getUid.name: getUid
getUid.short_desc: Get the user identifier used in authenticated
